attributes.action: introduce a mandatory 'Smoking Day' when all adults over the age of 18years must indulge in the sensational vice of smoking a cigarette, cigar or pipe at least once in the day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that National No Smoking Day has been thrust upon our compliant and complacent citizenry, it should therefore be deemed right and just that the other side of the debate be given equal opportunity to present the pro-smoking experience.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
